description:
Hello testers! we've been working non-stop to make CastView the best new tab for anyone,
with this update we introduce some small, breaking changes:

changes.title: ‚öôÔ∏è Settings menu (Not working)
changes.description: there's now a (non functional) (broken) settings menu!

changes.title: üìç Now the GeoLocation system Kind of works
changes.description: Don't worry, nothing is being shared with anyone but yourself (and the weather provider, naturally).

changes.title: üöë Published hotfixes for the hotfixes! wait wha-
changes.description: Developing stuff isn't easy, some of the known bugs should have been fixed, let us know if you find any.

notice: the weather settings are still unfinished, feel free to use updateWeather("location") to change the location
